title: 那個 領地插件好像
author: 墨尔本°晴╯
txt_content:
我在config.yml 裏設置了進入領地的漢化和離開的漢化但是進遊戲還是英文的。
有什麼解決的方法嗎 編碼是ANSI的

      Messaging:
           # Whether or not the player can change the Residence enter and leave messages.
           CanChange: true
           # The default enter message to apply to new Residences created by players in this group.
           # Leaving the message blank will disable it.
           DefaultEnter: 歡迎 %player 來到 %residence, 該領地的擁有者是 %owner.
           # The default leave message to apply to new Residences created by players in this group.
           # Leaving the message blank will disable it.
           DefaultLeave: 離開 %residence.
       # Options relating to the Lease system.

replies.author: skykun
replies.txt_content: 更换几个代码格式（比如大五码）尝试一下
